markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Brine Shark](/Monsters.aspx?ID=196)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Brine sharks are deadly elementals that roam the endless oceans of the Plane of Water.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Brine Shark](/Monsters.aspx?ID=196)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 152</row>

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Immunities**
bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Resistances**
fire 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, swim 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d12+7 piercing plus Grab

**Deep Plunge** <actions string="Single Action" />  The brine shark dives straight down into the water, moving up to twice its swim Speed in a straight vertical line. It can use this ability while grabbing a creature.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-45" />
name: Brine Shark
